cab.content: Military Secret.1112i Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, Vdili October 1919.(Received 14th.)13th October. No. 109. Part I-(1) Nothing of interest to report north of Kuram. . (2) Some Waziri and Mahsnd gangs reported out in Gumal and south-west of Bannu respectively.Part II. (3) On the 9th October Waziri lashkar was reported to have left the vicinity of Manjhi.(4) Wana and neighbourhood were effectively bombed on 9th October in retaliation-tion for raid by Wana Waziris on the Manjhi area.(5) On the same date airplanes attacked with bombs and machine guns gang-estimated at 200 which was waiting to attack our pickets near Mirzail in Tochi.(6) Agent to the Governor-General, Baluchistan, arrived at Fort Sandeman on 9th October.Communicated to Press.
